channel.title: How do I use different clients for the same source?
channel.description:
it's a PI pretty sure 317-525 based, Vistex v7 to be specific. I have the client that goes with the source and it works, but the i have a customized client that was from the same source a while ago(i customized), and id like to use it now. But when I log in, everything around seems nulled and when i click it freezes. Now, I downloaded Galkon's client http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/204191-galkons-refactored-base-474-look-like.html and i get this error when i try to log in and it just instantly logs me out "Error: T2 - 126,-1,-1 - 25,0,0 - 64,108,114,101,64,80,108,97,121,101,114,115,32, 79,110,108,105,110,101,58,32,49,10,113,105,"
Basically, I have a client that is normally based off this source, and can't use it anymore. Is there something in the server's coding that's only accepting that one client? please help. If it's cache based, i'm alright with working with that.

item.title: How do I use different clients for the same source?
item.dc:creator: @baucom40 baucom40
item.description:
@baucom40 wrote:

[quote=“justinmperry, post:1, topic:543439”]it’s a PI pretty sure 317-525 based, Vistex v7 to be specific. I have the client that goes with the source and it works, but the i have a customized client that was from the same source a while ago(i customized), and id like to use it now. But when I log in, everything around seems nulled and when i click it freezes. Now, I downloaded Galkon’s client
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/204191-galkons-refactored-base-474-look-like.html
and i get this error when i try to log in and it just instantly logs me out
"Error: T2 - 126,-1,-1 - 25,0,0 - 64,108,114,101,64,80,108,97,121,101,114,115,32,
79,110,108,105,110,101,58,32,49,10,113,105,"

Basically, I have a client that is normally based off this source, and can’t use it anymore. Is there something in the server’s coding that’s only accepting that one client? please help. If it’s cache based, i’m alright with working with that.[/quote]some clients just arent compatible after updates/change of sources

Read full topic
item.source: How do I use different clients for the same source?
